means: 控制( contain的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

sentence.Network_en: The city authorities said the curfew had contained the violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 市政府称宵禁遏制住了暴力事件。

sentence.Network_en: Act II contained one of the funniest scenes I have ever witnessed.
sentence.Network_cn: 第二幕里有我看过的最搞笑的场面之一。

PerfectNetExp.abs: contained是什么意思|contained的中文意思... ... contained ： 包含的 contained ： 所含 contained ： 容纳的.
如果用Jung的话来说,婚姻、爱情皆为一种psychological relationship,必有一方为容器(container),一方为被容纳的(contained)。复杂的一方为容器,包容着简单的一方.
The paper parcel contained a clean shirt , socks and a handkerchief ., 纸包里有一件干净的衬衫 , 短袜和一方手帕.
the signal contained thousands of bits of information ., 信号中含有大量的信息量.

list.abs: 法简化其生产与消费。容器格式描述于容器 (Container) ，并定义在 [OCF3]。
【货代知识】货代常用英文缩写 ... 基本险 marine risk 集装箱 container 记名提单 order B/L.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... jazz n 爵士音乐 contain vt 包含；容纳 △ hip-hop n 希荷普（音乐） △.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... jazz n 爵士音乐 contain vt 包含；容纳 △ hip-hop n 希荷普（音乐） △.
应该遏制（containment）还是应该接触(engagement)？应遏制加接触(congagement)还是融合(integration)？

entry.def: If something such as a box, bag, room, or place contains things, those things are inside it.

example.ex: The bag contained a Christmas card...
example.tran: 这个包里装着一张圣诞卡。

example.ex: Factory shops contain a wide range of cheap furnishings...
example.tran: 工厂车间里陈设着种类繁多的廉价家具。

entry.def: If a substance contains something, that thing is a part of it.

example.ex: Greek yogurt contains much less fat than double cream...
example.tran: 希腊酸奶比高脂浓奶油所含脂肪要少得多。

example.ex: Many cars run on petrol which contains lead.

entry.tran: (著作、讲话或电影中)包括，包含
entry.def: If writing, speech, or film contains particular information, ideas, or images, it includes them.

example.ex: This sheet contained a list of problems a patient might like to raise with the doctor...
example.tran: 这张单子列出了病人可能会向医生提出的一系列问题。

example.ex: The two discs also contain two of Britten's lesser-known song-cycles.
example.tran: 这两张唱片还包含了布里顿两首不甚知名的声乐套曲。

entry.def: If a group or organization contains a certain number of people, those are the people that are in it.

example.ex: The committee contains 11 Democrats and nine Republicans.
example.tran: 这个委员会包括11名民主党人和9名共和党人。

entry.def: If you contain something, you control it and prevent it from spreading or increasing.

example.ex: More than a hundred firemen are still trying to contain the fire at the plant...
example.tran: 上百名消防队员仍在试图控制工厂的火势。

example.ex: The city authorities said the curfew had contained the violence.
example.tran: 市政府称宵禁遏制住了暴力事件。

entry.def: If you cannot contain a feeling such as excitement or anger, or if you cannot contain yourself, you cannot prevent yourself from showing your feelings.

example.ex: But he was bursting with curiosity, and one day he just couldn't contain himself. 'What are you going to do?' he asked...
example.tran: 但他满心好奇，一天，他真的忍不住了。“你打算做什么？”他问道。

example.ex: Evans could barely contain his delight: 'I'm so proud of her,' he said.
example.tran: 埃文斯喜不自禁：“我真为她骄傲。”他说。

sentences.sentence: "striking with contained ferocity at my head"- R.L.Stevenson

auth_sentence.content: It contained songs of impact, if not longevity.
auth_sentence.res_content: It contained songs of impact, if not longevity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It contained songs of impact, if not longevity.

auth_sentence.content: So how will this heat and pressure be contained?
auth_sentence.res_content: So how will this heat and pressure be contained?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So how will this heat and pressure be contained?

auth_sentence.content: One box contained one sticker, the other four.
auth_sentence.res_content: One box contained one sticker, the other four.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One box contained one sticker, the other four.

Sentence.sentence: In a 2011 study, for instance, people who drank the same 380-calorie(卡路里) milkshake on two separate occasions produced different levels of hunger-related hormones (荷尔蒙), depending on whether the shake's label said it contained 620 or 140 calories.
Other iced coffees contained more than 450 calories and the majority had an excess of 200.
